title: error_summary
description: The errors summary of a build log

version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

_id.description: The ID associated with the object

job.description: The job associated with this object

job_id.description: The ID of the associated job

kernel.description: The kernel associated with this object

defconfig.description: The name of the defconfig as reported by the continuous integration system

errors.description: List of lists of unique error lines found in all the builds and their count

mismatches.description: List of lists of unique mismatched lines found in the build log and their count

warnings.description: List of lists of unique warning lines found in the build log and their count
